<status value="active"/> <experimental value="true"/> <type> <coding> <system value="http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/library-type"/> <code value="logic-library"/> <display value="Logic Library"/> </coding> </type> <date value="2019-07-28"/> <publisher value="World Health Organization (WHO)"/> <description value="Decision Support Logic for use in "/> <useContext> <code> <system value="http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/usage-context-type"/> <code value="focus"/> </code> <valueCodeableConcept> <coding> <system value="http://snomed.info/sct"/> <code value="77386006"/> <display value="Pregnant (finding)"/> </coding> </valueCodeableConcept> </useContext> <purpose value="..."/> <usage value="..."/> <copyright value="© WHO 2019+."/> <topic> <text value="Pregnancy"/> </topic> <relatedArtifact> <type value="documentation"/> <display value="WHO guideline for a positive pregnancy experience"/> <url value="https://www.who.int/reproductivehealth/publications/maternal_perinatal_health/anc-positive-pregnancy-experience/en/"/> </relatedArtifact> <relatedArtifact> <type value="depends-on"/> <resource value="http://fhir.org/guides/who/anc/Library/anc-common"/> </relatedArtifact> <content> <contentType value="application/elm+xml"/> <data value=""/> </content> <content> <contentType value="text/cql"/> <data value=""/> </content> </Library>

<PlanDefinition xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://hl7.org/fhir ../../../../../../HL7/FHIR-Spec/4.0.0/fhir-all-xsd/fhir-all.xsd">
	<id value="anc-recommendation-a2"/>
	<url value="http://fhir.org/guides/who/anc/PlanDefinition/anc-recommendation-a2"/>
	<identifier>
		<use value="official"/>
		<value value="PlanDefinition_Recommendation_A2"/>
	</identifier>
	<version value="0.1.0"/>
	<name value="PlanDefinition_Recommendation_A2"/>
	<title value="PlanDefinition - WHO ANC Guideline Recommendation #A2"/>
	<type>
		<coding>
			<system value="http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/plan-definition-type"/>
			<code value="eca-rule"/>
			<display value="ECA Rule"/>
		</coding>
	</type>
	<status value="draft"/>
	<experimental value="true"/>
	<date value="2019-05-15"/>
	<copyright value="© WHO 2019+."/>
	<library value="http://fhir.org/guides/who/anc/Library/anc-recommendation-a2|0.1.0"/>
	<action>
		<title value="Iron and Folic Acid Supplementation"/>
		<textEquivalent value="Daily elemental iron should be increased to 120 mg until her Hb concentration rises to normal"/>
		<trigger>
			<type value="named-event"/>
			<name value="anc-contact"/>
		</trigger>
		<condition>
			<kind value="applicability"/>
			<expression>
				<language value="text/cql"/>
				<expression value="ANCRecommendationA2."Has Anaemia""/>
			</expression>
		</condition>
		<definitionCanonical value="http://fhir.org/guides/who/anc-cds/ActivityDefinition/anc-daily-elemental-iron"/>
		<!--
		<groupingBehavior value="visual-group"/>
		<selectionBehavior value="exactly-one"/>
		<dynamicValue>
			<path value="action.title"/>
			<expression value="Get Summary"/>
		</dynamicValue>
		<dynamicValue>
			<path value="action.description"/>
			<expression value="Get Detail"/>
		</dynamicValue>
		<dynamicValue>
			<path value="activity.extension"/>
			<expression value="Get Indicator"/>
		</dynamicValue>
-->
		<!--
On every contact,
  if anaemia detected
    recommend 120 mg of elemental iron daily (Recommendation A.2.1)
  else if population anaemia prevalence >= 40%
    recommend 60 mg of elemental iron and 400 ug of folic acid, daily (Recommendation A.2.1)
  else if population anaemia prevalence < 20% or daily iron not acceptable due to side-effects
    recommend intermittent oral iron: 120 mg of oral iron, and 2.8 ug of folic acid, weekly (Recommendation A.2.2)
  else
    recommend 30 to 60 mg of elemental iron and 400 ug of folic acid, daily (Recommendation A.2.1)
  check iron-intake compliance;
  check iron-side effects;
-->
		<!--
    <action>
  		<condition>
      <description value"Due to population's high anaemia prevalence, daily dose of 60 mg of elemental iron is preferred over a lower dose"/>
  			<kind value="applicability"/>
  			<language value="text/cql"/>
  			<expression value="Is High Anaemia Prevalence"/>
  		</condition>
    </action>

    <action>
  		<condition>
      <description value"Intermitent oral iron and folic acid supplementation with 120 mg of elemental iron and 2800 mcg (2.8 mg) of folic acid once weekly"/>
  			<kind value="applicability"/>
  			<language value="text/cql"/>
  			<expression value="Has Low Anaemia Prevalence or Iron Side Effects"/>
  		</condition>
    </action>
-->
	</action>
</PlanDefinition>

<status value="active"/> <experimental value="true"/> <date value="2019-06-01"/> <publisher value="World Health Organization"/> <description value="120mg elemental iron daily"/> <useContext> <code> <system value="http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/usage-context-type"/> <code value="focus"/> </code> <valueCodeableConcept> <coding> <system value="http://snomed.info/sct"/> <code value="77386006"/> <display value="Pregnant (finding)"/> </coding> </valueCodeableConcept> </useContext> <purpose value="Defines a guideline supported prescription for daily elemental iron for anaemic patients"/> <copyright value="© WHO 2019+."/> <date value="2019-05-15"/> <kind value="MedicationRequest"/> <productCodeableConcept> <text value="elemental iron"/> </productCodeableConcept> <dosage> <text value="120mg daily"/> <timing> <repeat> <frequency value="1"/> <period value="1"/> <periodUnit value="d"/> </repeat> </timing> <route> <coding> <code value="26643006"/> <display value="Oral route (qualifier value)"/> </coding> <text value="Oral route (qualifier value)"/> </route> <doseAndRate> <type> <coding> <system value="http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/dose-rate-type"/> <code value="ordered"/> <display value="Ordered"/> </coding> </type> <doseQuantity> <value value="120"/> <unit value="mg"/> </doseQuantity> </doseAndRate> </dosage> </ActivityDefinition>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Patient xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
	<id value="mom"/>
	<meta>
		<profile value="http://fhir.org/guides/who/anc-cds/StructureDefinition/ancpatient"/>
	</meta>
	<identifier>
		<use value="official"/>
		<value value="1000"/>
	</identifier>
	<active value="true"/>
	<name>
		<use value="official"/>
		<family value="Everywoman"/>
		<given value="Eve"/>
	</name>
	<telecom>
		<system value="phone"/>
		<value value="555-555-2003"/>
		<use value="mobile"/>
	</telecom>
	<gender value="female"/>
	<birthDate value="1993-05-31"/>
	<address>
		<use value="home"/>
		<text value="2222 Home Street"/>
	</address>
</Patient>
